languages.text: {n}Священник примирительно поднимает руки.{/n} "Грешны все, благородная Инцендия. К чему выделять кого-то и дознаваться его грехов, когда истиной чистоты не сыскать нигде".

traits.locale_text: {n}Священник примирительно поднимает руки.{/n} "Грешны все, благородная Инцендия. К чему выделять кого-то и дознаваться его грехов, когда истиной чистоты не сыскать нигде".

languages.text: {n}The priest holds up his hands in a placating gesture.{/n} "None are without fault, noble Incendia. What point is there in targeting someone for their turpitude when true purity can never be found?"
languages.original_text: {n}Священник примирительно поднимает руки.{/n} "Грешны все, благородная Инцендия. К чему выделять кого-то и дознаваться его грехов, когда истиной чистоты не сыскать нигде".

traits.locale_text: {n}The priest holds up his hands in a placating gesture.{/n} "None are without sin, noble Incendia. What point is there in targeting someone for their sins when true purity can never be found?"
{n}The priest holds up his hands in a placating gesture.{/n} "None are without sin, noble Incendia. What point is there in targeting someone for their sins when true purity can never be found?"

{n}The priest holds up his hands in a placating gesture.{/n} "None are without fault, noble Incendia. What point is there in targeting someone for their turpitude when true purity can never be found?"

languages.text: {n}司祭は、なだめるようなそぶりで両手を挙げる。{/n}「問題の無い者などおりません、尊きインセンディア。真の純真さが見当たらないといって、人の罪をあげつらうことに、何の意味があるでしょう？」
languages.original_text: {n}The priest holds up his hands in a placating gesture.{/n} "None are without fault, noble Incendia. What point is there in targeting someone for their turpitude when true purity can never be found?"

traits.locale_text: {n}司祭は、なだめるようなそぶりで両手を挙げる。{/n}「問題の無い者などおりません、尊きインセンディア。真の純真さが見当たらないといって、人の罪をあげつらうことに、何の意味があるでしょう？」

languages.text: {n}牧师举起双手，做了一个安抚的手势。{/n}“尊敬的因森蒂娅，凡人焉能无过？若世上本就没有无瑕的纯洁，又何必处处针对某一人的卑劣？”
languages.original_text: {n}The priest holds up his hands in a placating gesture.{/n} "None are without fault, noble Incendia. What point is there in targeting someone for their turpitude when true purity can never be found?"

traits.locale_text: {n}牧师举起双手，做了一个安抚的手势。{/n}“尊敬的因森蒂娅，凡人焉能无过？若世上本就没有无瑕的纯洁，又何必处处针对某一人的卑劣？”

languages.text: {n}El sacerdote levanta las manos en gesto apaciguador.{/n} «No hay nadie sin tacha, noble Incendia. ¿Qué sentido tiene atacar a alguien por su bajeza cuando la auténtica pureza es algo que nadie puede encontrar?».
languages.original_text: {n}The priest holds up his hands in a placating gesture.{/n} "None are without fault, noble Incendia. What point is there in targeting someone for their turpitude when true purity can never be found?"

traits.locale_text: {n}El sacerdote levanta las manos en gesto apaciguador.{/n} «No hay nadie sin tacha, noble Incendia. ¿Qué sentido tiene atacar a alguien por su bajeza cuando la auténtica pureza es algo que nadie puede encontrar?».

languages.text: {n}Le prêtre lève les mains en signe d'apaisement.{/n} « Personne n'est parfait, noble Incendia. Pourquoi condamner quelqu'un pour ses turpitudes alors que la véritable pureté n'est qu'une illusion ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The priest holds up his hands in a placating gesture.{/n} "None are without fault, noble Incendia. What point is there in targeting someone for their turpitude when true purity can never be found?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le prêtre lève les mains en signe d'apaisement.{/n} « Personne n'est parfait, noble Incendia. Pourquoi condamner quelqu'un pour ses turpitudes alors que la véritable pureté n'est qu'une illusion ? »

languages.text: {n}Der Priester erhebt beschwichtigend seine Hände.{/n} "Niemand ist ohne Fehl, verehrte Incendia. Warum sollte man jemanden für seine Verderbtheit verurteilen, wenn es völlige Reinheit gar nicht gibt?"
languages.original_text: {n}The priest holds up his hands in a placating gesture.{/n} "None are without fault, noble Incendia. What point is there in targeting someone for their turpitude when true purity can never be found?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Priester erhebt beschwichtigend seine Hände.{/n} "Niemand ist ohne Fehl, verehrte Incendia. Warum sollte man jemanden für seine Verderbtheit verurteilen, wenn es völlige Reinheit gar nicht gibt?"

languages.text: {n}Rahip, sakinleştirici bir hareketle ellerini kaldırıyor.{/n} "Hatasız kul olmaz soylu İncendia. Gerçek saflığa ulaşmak imkânsızken kişiyi küstahlığından ötürü hedef almanın ne anlamı var?"
languages.original_text: {n}The priest holds up his hands in a placating gesture.{/n} "None are without fault, noble Incendia. What point is there in targeting someone for their turpitude when true purity can never be found?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Rahip, sakinleştirici bir hareketle ellerini kaldırıyor.{/n} "Hatasız kul olmaz soylu İncendia. Gerçek saflık asla bulunamazken kişiyi küstahlığı için hedef almanın ne anlamı var?"
